      Logs a message at level Level.Debug.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(Level level,
         Throwable throwable,
         String message)
        Logs a message at the given level. A non-null throwable will also be logged.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to log to
        throwable - the Throwable to log or null if no exception should be logged
        message - the message to log
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or message is null

      • log

        void log(Level level,
         Throwable throwable,
         String format,
         Object arg)
        Logs a message based on the given format and enriched with the passed arg at the given level. A non-null throwable will also be logged.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to log to
        throwable - the Throwable to log or null if no exception should be logged
        format - the format to log
        arg - the argument to pass to the format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or format is null

      • log

        void log(Level level,
         Throwable throwable,
         String format,
         Object arg1,
         Object arg2)
        Logs a message based on the given format and enriched with the passed arguments at the given level. A non-null throwable will also be logged.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to log to
        throwable - the Throwable to log or null if no exception should be logged
        format - the format to log
        arg1 - the first argument to pass to the format
        arg2 - the second argument to pass to the format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or format is null

      • log

        void log(Level level,
         Throwable throwable,
         String format,
         Object arg1,
         Object arg2,
         Object arg3)
        Logs a message based on the given format and enriched with the passed arguments at the given level. A non-null throwable will also be logged.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to log to
        throwable - the Throwable to log or null if no exception should be logged
        format - the format to log
        arg1 - the first argument to pass to the format
        arg2 - the second argument to pass to the format
        arg3 - the third argument to pass to the format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or format is null

      • log

        void log(Level level,
         Throwable throwable,
         String format,
         Object arg1,
         Object arg2,
         Object arg3,
         Object... args)
        Logs a message based on the given format and enriched with the passed arguments at the given level. A non-null throwable will also be logged.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to log to
        throwable - the Throwable to log or null if no exception should be logged
        format - the format to log
        arg1 - the first argument to pass to the format
        arg2 - the second argument to pass to the format
        arg3 - the third argument to pass to the format
        args - additional parameters to pass to the format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or format is null

      • trace

        default void trace(Throwable throwable,
                   String message)
        Logs a message at level Level.Trace. The given throwable will also be logged if configured but does not need to be set.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to log
        message - the message to log
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or message is null

      • trace

        default void trace(Throwable throwable,
                   String format,
                   Object arg)
        Logs a message based on the given format and enriched with the passed arg at level Level.Trace. The given throwable will also be logged if configured but does not need to be set.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to log
        format - the format to log
        arg - the argument to pass to the format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or message is null

      • trace

                   String format,
                   Object arg1,

        NullPointerException - whenever level or message is null

      • warning

        default void warning(Throwable throwable,
                     String message)
        Logs a message at level Level.Warning. The given throwable will also be logged if configured but does not need to be set.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to log
        message - the message to log
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whenever level or message is null

      • warning

        default void warning(Throwable throwable,
                     String format,
                     Object arg)

        format - the format to log
        arg - the argument to pass to the format
